title.en: Doctoral Seminar in Botany and Mycology

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

course_main_structural_unit.address:
J. Liivi 2
50409 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Talks will be given by students and staff members of the Department of Botany, as well as by visiting lecturers. All PhD students should give at least two seminars about their research results during their PhD studies. This informs staff and students of the department about research done by colleagues, and enables broader and deeper discussion of the PhD students research and its results.
description.et: Seminaril esinevad nii botaanika osakonna õppejõud kui ka kutsutud külalislektorid. Iga doktorant on kohustatud õpinguaja vältel esinema vähemalt kahel korral oma uurimistöö tulemustest. See võimaldab osakonna töötajatel ning ka kraadiõppuritel olla vastastikku kursis kõrvalerialal toimuva tööga, samuti kraadiõppurite teadustöö laiemat sisulist arutamist.

objectives.en: The aim of the seminars is to provide a broad overview on scientific research in their own and neighbouring research fields as well as in theoretical and methodological topics of of broader interest, to enable gaining experience in giving a research seminar, and developing skills of professional communication. Seminars are held in English.
objectives.et: Seminaride eesmärk on tutvustada kraadiõppuritele oma eriala ning naabererialade uurimistulemusi, samuti mitmesuguseid laiemat huvi pakkuvaid teoreetilisi ning metoodilisi probleeme, pakkuda ettekandmiskogemust ning arendada erialase eneseväljenduse oskust. Seminarid toimuvad inglise keeles.

learning_outcomes.en:
The PhD student who passed the course successfully:
- Has overview and is well informed about new developments of research in his/her field of study
- Is able to analyze critically his/her own scientific results and the results of other scientists,
- Is able to use scientific terminology on the professional level,
- Is able to present and explain his/her scientific results to the researchers of the same specialty,
- Is able to present and explain his/her scientific results to the broad scientific community.
learning_outcomes.et:
Kursuse edukalt läbinud doktorant:
- omab ülevaadet  ja orienteerub oma eriala uuemates uurimissuundades ja teadustulemustes,
- suudab kriitiliselt hinnata ja diskuteerida oma uurimissuuna teadustulemuste üle,
- oskab kasutada erialast teaduskeelt,
- on võimeline koostama ja esitama rahvusvahelisel tasemel teadusettekannet,
- omab piisavaid esinemisoskuseid ja kasutab kaasaegset esitlustehnikat,
- suudab tutvustada oma teadustulemusi laiemale avalikkusele.

grade_evaluation.et: osalemine üle 75% seminaridel annab 1,5EAP, osalemine konverentsil 1EAP, suuline ettekanne konverentsil 3 EAP, vaatmik 2EAP
